document_data.name: Tamarind
document_data.distinctions: Brown-orange leguminous fruit, bright orange spice
document_data.mainbody:
{{wikipedia article|Tamarind}}
'''Tamarind''' was a tree that produced edible brown-orange leguminous fruit that was consumed as a [[spice]].{{Cite dragon/421/Abyssal Trade Goods: Not a Bad Thing|32}}
document_data.Usages:
Tamarin was a cooking ingredient used for its warm spicy flavor. For example, in Mosstone, tamarind was used to create bite-sized [[sugar]]-dusted pastry known as [[tamarind ball]]s. They were available from the [[Drover's Last Drink]] tavern and loved by [[Volothamp Geddarm]].{{cite web| url = http://forum.candlekeep.com/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=14621&whichpage=13| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 30-04-2021| date = 30-04-2021}}

Tamarind was known to be used in medicine for its infection-preventing properties and especially handy against gangrene.
